website_summaries.verdict: Solo's Bucket Tote may not be the most stylish bag around, but we like the solid leather construction, and given its size, it can handle a lot more than the average laptop case.
pros: pass-through feature to slip onto luggage
cons: Snap closures still leaves much of the inside exposed

customer_reviews.title: A true bucket
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather and a good shape make this a pretty bag. But when they call it a "bucket," they mean it! There's no top zipper, snap or even a flap to keep the top closed and covered. I don't feel comfortable carrying my expensive electronics in a bag with a completely open top. Nor would I care to see my papers, mail, or whatever falling onto the floor if the bag tipped over, so I returned it. It doesn't make much sense to label it a "laptop" bag. It's not a fashionable briefcase; it is a classy and sturdy tote.
customer_reviews.author: Maude A.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a larger bag than I thought it would be, but I use it as my daily handbag. Love it. It's well made, well designed, and has thoughtful details. I have a MacBook Air and with the flap closed over the computer pocket, you really can't tell there's a computer inside it. Lots of pockets. I don't end up using the one on the exterior of the bag very often. Love that it has a sleeve that slides over the handle on a rolling suitcase, too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased consumer
customer_reviews.text: Carries weight well. Well linen with a beautiful fabric that makes storage of delicate items comfortable. Also anble to carry my large laptop with ease. I love the multiple pockets and the fact that the bag is well made with a good frame. It also looks and feels expensive. Since use ive noticed small cracks in the handle but not too excessive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, the best brief-bag I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I've had some nice briefcases and bags in my adult work life, but this one is the absolute best! It's vertical orientation means I'm less likely to whack someone trying to squeeze by them in narrow spaces (e.g., airplane aisles!). I first bought this bag over six years ago. Just replaced it with the same model due to its sturdiness. Main reason for replacing the old one was that the handle-straps are finally starting to wear out. I sincerely hope Solo keeps this model forever. I'll probably need a few more of them before I finish my working lifespan! PS - I paid about $100 for this bag 6 years ago. Paid $114 for the replacement. GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.author: asqrd14

customer_reviews.title: Nylon bottom - not 100% leather
customer_reviews.text: Bag came quickly and was excited to open it - disappointed that there's nylon fabric on the bottom and it's not 100% leather. Went back and re-read the description and it's never mentioned nor is it shown in the photos. They do point out the metal feet on the bottom to protect the bag but not the nylon fabric - and it says leather body - so apparently the bottom of the bag isn't considered "the body". Will try it out at my meeting next week to see how I like it but this did take a little of the shine off of the product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: If this bag ever dies, I will absolutely buy it again! As a teacher, this is perfect for throwing in papers, folders, and electronics, along with my ever-present host of writing utensils. I enjoy all of the pockets and the lovely blue lining I got. It is a DARK brown. I get compliments all the time, and it's barely showing signs of wear after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying your life in a bag.
customer_reviews.text: Best handbag / laptop bag ever. Enjoying the hell out of this handbag. Love the number of pockets and the design and the leather. Almost perfect. The only thing I'd change: Make the smaller zipper pocket on the exterior open with two zipper closures rather than one, and provide a snap clasp that works to bring the two long edges together on top. Both of those are minor things though. This is a perfect bag for women on the go who have the carry their lives in a bag and want to do it in style.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice quality bag that holds my laptop and other items. THe compartments help keep things organized and the pocket on the back with the unzip option to slide over a suitcase handle is useful. It;s tall and slim and I prefer than to a wide bulky bag. Sized well if you are over 5'8", I mean it's good for all sizes, but you can carry over the shoulder or as a breifcase if you are taller. It's a very dark brown that can almost pass for black.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive bag, well made with lots of different storage areas including padded laptop sleeve. Square bottom allows it to be set on the ground without tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and wanted a nice, professional, classy computer bag that would fit under an airplane seat. I thought this would be the one: such a lovely bag, and so well made! To my great disappointment, it was far too heavy and bulky to be comfortable carrying as a shoulder bag, and was just a bit too tall for the handle on my rolling luggage. I sadly had to return it. (I instead found a nylon bag at The Container Store with wider straps that carries the computer horizontally instead of vertically; the same amount of stuff feels so much lighter!)
customer_reviews.author: Library Lil'

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and versatile bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I've had it about a month and I want to order another just in case I ever lose it or rip it. It's very sturdy, very attractive as well. There are great inside and outside pockets. I love that the side pocked has a zipper on the bottom that turns it into a sturdy sleeve to slip over the handle of my rolling bag, making it great for transferring planes and running through airports. I've actually taken my laptop out of it on trips and use the bag as a tote. It looks great with business and business casual outfits. Very pleased with the quality and the price of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila N

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Fantastic price for what looks to be a high-quality product. The stitching is solid and straight, and the leather feels very soft and supple. Some reviews state that the bag height plus handle length results in scraping on the ground if you try to carry it in your hand. I am 5'-6", and this bag is the perfect length to wear on my shoulder or carry in my hand without the bag scraping the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Becky D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much! My laptop is 15.6" and although it is a tad too big for the pocket, it doesn't matter for carrying purposes unless you worry about covering it with the flap (I do not). Interior color is beautiful. Leather is beautiful. Handle drop is perfect and handle is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrseche

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is deep- I love it. I finally find a bag I can put a lot of stuff in ( make up bag, umbrella, purse, files, gadgets,...) while staying organized. I love the fact that I can easily access my phone, keys, pen, iPad, laptop, or light files. It looks very professional. This is a great purchase. I will not use it to carry heavy case files for work so I bought the Solo D-535 briefcase as a back up. if I take good care of it will give me a few years. A great bag for a decent price. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I must have looked at over a thousand bags and read hundreds of reviews before I decided on this one. It is just as wonderful as the reviews portrayed. It has all the features I was looking for: Under 100 dollars, leather, outside pocket, stylish enough to use as a purse, colorful lining, feet, and roomy interior. Plus it has the bonus feature of being able to slide over the handle of your carry on bag. It is great for every day use and for traveling. I only wish there was more of a color choice: specifically black.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, roomy, functional, almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, and I've been looking for the right bag for a long time. My only "complaint" is that the laptop pouch is on one side of the bag, which makes it unsteady/weighted to that side when carrying a laptop. But they have thought of so many other small details (comfortable shoulder straps, feet on the bottom of the bag, a luggage sleeve to slide it over carry-on handles, lots of organizing pockets...), it more than makes up for this minor inconvenience. Definitey recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Odgers Lax

customer_reviews.title: Classy tote for the office
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Slightly more stable to carry laptop and files than the other (wider) Solo leather tote (15.6"?). Makes it easier to hold a coffee mug in one hand, and open doors or carry an umbrella with the other of need be. Leather feels of good durability, and quality. But with the straps, as they're usually the first to go, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ajaa957

customer_reviews.title: Nice tote!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag - I have been using it for about 3 or 4 months now. I have a large lap top and it fits nicely. Great pockets for the mouse, cell phone, pens, and books. Outside zipper pocket can also hold a book or small purse if necessary. Fits over my shoulder nicely and the leather is good quality and a nice color. Stands upright even when loaded. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Gal

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but weighs a ton
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful leather and is well-designed. But it is heavy. Very heavy. Even without the laptop in it heavy. But it looks so fabulous I bought it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Maria LynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: For the person that needs to carry a laptop but doesn't want to carry a briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, nice quality! This bag lets me carry my laptop without carrying a large laptop bag. I bought it because it looks and feels like I am carrying a large purse. Since the bag comes right under my arm I am not concerned with the open top while carrying it, and the laptop actually has a flap that encloses it into the laptop pocket so it is completely secure and out of sight. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Woolgathering

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag; Thick, high quality leather...
customer_reviews.text: Received this bag today. The entire exterior is made from high quality, heavy gorgeous leather - smells so good. Not fond of the closure on the laptop portion - the top strips are vertical, the lower strip is horizontal. They don't stick together well at all (see pic). Also not sure what the leather strips inside are for. But the quality of the bag is so nice, the leather gorgeous and it has so much room. It's exactly what I wanted, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Sage

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Stylish has alot of room. Love it will slide over my luggage handle
customer_reviews.author: Truffles McWiley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful. It was a little bigger than I expected in terms of height but that's fine, as it holds more (maybe not so good for me to be carrying more. Weight!). I do wish it had a separate compartment for all my charging cords (laptop cord, phone charger, iPad charger, etc) because they get tangled with other things and are all over the place in the bag but that's the only drawback for me,
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My lap top is pretty large (15.6) and still fits in the protected computer slot with a shorter fold over. It is a nice bag and nice color and pretty easy on the shoulders. It has an outside zipped compartment and on the other side, an outside open compartment. I will update this review after I have used the bag for awhile and I am sure it will be pretty consistently.
customer_reviews.author: L. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Best Carry On ever!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is truly great. The only reason that I didn't give it a 5 star review is because, my fault, i didn't look closely, is that the top does not close, and things can fall out. I'm fixing that with the help of a shoemaker friend with a strap and velcro, but besides that, it's a wonderful piece and very much worth the price, which was the best on Amazon over all other sites, and believe me, I LOOKED!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: The tote is well constructed and looks like it will last for quite awhile
customer_reviews.text: Tote arrived promptly, well packaged. The tote is well constructed and looks like it will last for quite awhile. It is roomy enough for all my files, computer and cords that I haul around each day. The handles are securely attached to the bag and the right length to put on your shoulder and carry. I really like it having the 2 outside pockets for easy access to phone, other misc. papers that make it easy to get to. Thanks!! Ree
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: the bag itself looks pretty luxurious. It is more a black than a ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this bag in the box, I was surprised that the bag was somewhat folded up and occupied only one third of the size of the box. I also found a 'return item' paper from somewhere in bangalore! So the bag really did travel more than halfway around the world before I got it! Having said that, the bag itself looks pretty luxurious. It is more a black than a dark brown and the kingfisher lining is of sturdy quality. I was able to carry many things in it. It sits comfortably on my shoulders . One of my best purchases, I would say.
customer_reviews.author: ummi

customer_reviews.title: this bag is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would save my back - something other than those long sling bags with the strap that hangs down to your waist. The way this bag carries on my shoulder is GREAT. And it's really roomy - even more so than my old laptop bag. The laptop case inside is sleek and fits my computer perfectly, with plenty of roominess left. I don't have to carry a separate purse when I travel. And the pocket on the back that fits over the handle of my roller bag - PERFECT. I couldn't be more pleased with the quality and functionality of this bag! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: michelle soyars

customer_reviews.title: This could hold a desktop
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge, whatever you do don't get the bigger one. It will hold a laptop for sure, but you could lose it in this thing. Very light weight too. That was a nice surprise. Seems high quality, also has little feet (metal buttons) on the bottom to save wear and tear. I think overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Customer since 1999

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Super bag for toting my laptop as well as other items. Love the side pockets for stowing chargers. I love the espresso color. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: dmartin

customer_reviews.title: Really like the feel/look of bag
customer_reviews.text: Really like the feel/look of bag. Fits my large laptop, my franklin organizer, laptop battery, full size wallet and makeup bag. I use when I travel on business and it fits under the airplane seat. Downside- it does not close, so you have to be careful nothing falls out when under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for picky business traveler
customer_reviews.text: This bag was EXACTLY as described! A great bag for traveling! Very high quality. Not sure why one reviewer commented negatively on the lining...I am very picky. It took me about a month of shopping online and driving around to settle on this bag. I wanted leather and lots of compartments with the ability to slide it over my rolling carry-on. This fit the bill perfectly! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy P

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. It may be a laptop bag, but it's stylish enough to carry every day. It holds my regular stuff, plus my lunch, water bottle, and laptop. The leather is buttery soft. There are many pockets for organization. The only thing I would add to this bag is a zipper at the top.
customer_reviews.author: ImperfectlyMel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Leather Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect leather work bag. I am a small female and I think this is the perfect size. It is a bit long, but because it isn't wide I don't crash into things when trying to pass through halls - which I appreciate. It can hold my 18" laptop perfectly and has lots of pockets to hold pens/notebooks/business cards. I would love to buy this again if it came in black!
customer_reviews.author: Meg B

customer_reviews.title: Stands the Test of Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag over a year ago and travel with it at least 10 - 15 days a month. I use it for my carry on computer bag. It has held up well with all of the travel and I still receive compliments on it. Love the leather and all of the compartments for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag about 2 years ago. I get complimented all the time about it. It holds a lot. I generally carry my 17 inch laptop, a mouse, electronic notebook, a few paper folders, pens, post it notes, tissues, lip gloss and other odds and ends in it. It is awesome. It is holding up almost everywhere, but the front pouch zipper just broke.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: What a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bucket tote far exceeds my expectations. The shoulder straps don't fall. The teal lining makes surveying the contence easy and it holds an incredible amount of paperwork. The brown is a nice nutural and a high-quality leather that makes the bag look like it cost four-times as much.
customer_reviews.author: CPM

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall, but poorly designed pockets
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag a lot. Love that it's vertical...makes it more unique. My biggest complaint is with the front pocket. It really should have two zippers so that it can open from just the top and not from the side. I'd like to be able to open a little at the top to reach in and grab something while walking. The way it is right now, it's inconvenient and I end up never using that pocket, which is unfortunate because I liked the pockets and it's one of the reasons I bought this one...
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find. Beautiful bag with laptop section- lots of storage - great look- beautiful leather and a travel pocket for attaching to a rolling suitcase. Great travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: MDB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on the description and the customer reviews. I was not disappointed at all! I love this bag. All of the storage and the quality of the leather completely sold me. I carry this bag everyday. As a teacher, I carry tons of equipment and paper. This bag meets all of my needs. Definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: sjbleonard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice leather. Bag is large enough to hold a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice leather. Bag is large enough to hold a 15.4 Dell computer, power cords, and books. Pockets are roomy and plenty of them. Especially like the attachment on the back to slide over the handle of a suitcase when traveling, so the bag can hitch a ride on top of the suitcase without falling off!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Use this bag everyday and I have had it for over two years now. Nice padded laptop pocket that I actually use for my ipad. Perfect size to hold a few paper files or notebooks and the little things we always seem to need to bring along.
customer_reviews.author: houndhill

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bag to replace many other bags I have paid a fortune for that were poorly made and never lasted more then 6 months. This bag is the complete opposite, the leather is of good quality and the bag itself is well made. There is plenty of room to fit all my 'junk' in, including my 15.4' laptop and leads. The colours are great, lovely dark brown leather and vibrant blue lining. Delivery time was amazing, it was shipped from America to Australia within a week I'm very happy with my purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I was made to feel confident about purchasing this bag. The bag fits all of my work items well, and I like having the extra pockets both inside and out. The leather has a good feel and look. The only ereason that I did not give it 5 stars is because the weight of the bag is much heavier than expected. At times, I wish the bag had wheels due to the cumbersome feel and weight. As others stated, the bag is quite long, and I agree that the bag may be awkward and too long for some due to their height.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Great professional look without having to be a bulky cumbersome masculine tote. It’s durable, beautiful soft real leather and carries all of my things to and from work every day. Did I mention I paid $50 less than the one I saw in a retail store!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey L Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Space is wonderful and I have lots to carry daily
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this bag. Very sturdy functional and stylish. I’ll be getting another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, nice looking and a good quality bag. The shape of it seems to distribute the weight better than most computer bags and causes less strain on my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and sturdy. Holds my 15 inch laptop, a large notebook, a folder and my wallet/cosmetic bag with ease
customer_reviews.author: Gail H

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag...needs closure!
customer_reviews.text: A zipper across the top of the bag would make this perfect! Also dual zippers on the outer pocket would make access easier.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Magers

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and looks beautiful. I gave it 4 stars because the inner lining is a cheap material and the inside pockets get holes in them after a couple of months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: The back section that slips over the luggage handle is a great addition!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and functional bag! The back section that slips over the luggage handle is a great addition!
customer_reviews.author: Meric

customer_reviews.title: Love This Beautiful, Lush Laptop Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this Solo Bucket Bag after being bored stiff by the usual styles available and absolutely loved it at first inspection and still do. I find the oversized, padded handles extremely comfortable - don't even feel it on my shoulder. The interior padded compartment for the computer is protective with a nice velcro flap and no zippers to scratch the case. Plenty of room and pockets for all the extras, and the bucket bottom with feet is very stable. It definitely is genuine leather, soft and supple. The style is feminine instead of boxy and all-business, yet makes a professional impression. Could double as a beautiful handbag on its own, in my view. I wouldn't change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B

customer_reviews.title: Solo Vintage Collection, Ladies Leather Bucket Tote for Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love the leather laptop bag. Several compartments, laptop fits nicely. Classy looking for not a lot of money. Also is compatible with my luggage and will slip right on to the pull handle. It's awesome looking bag!
customer_reviews.author: LDeck

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect for Daily  Business Use
customer_reviews.text: This bag meets my every need for daily business use. It's a little heavy, but manageable. Love the way I can use it onto my rolling luggage, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: pworrell

customer_reviews.title: Solo: great leather briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I had my new solo briefcase for about six weeks.it is made well, stylish.I can carry everything I need to and from the office.I would recommend anybody to purchase this particular briefcase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Tall bag, sturdy and you can fit a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is as advertised and makes good use of pockets and space. It does stand up right well. It would be nice to see it in different textile or colors. Straps DO NOT fall off shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: ... bag when I travel for work and it is EXCELLENT! Great storage options inside excellent construction
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag when I travel for work and it is EXCELLENT! Great storage options inside excellent construction. II only wish I could have gotten it in black when I purchased. Best work bag I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: A great travel tote!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for toting around my laptop when traveling. This is a well designed travel tote. Lots of space for everything in addition to computer items. My 10 x 15 inch comptuter fit just right. I especially appreciate the optional zip open pocket in the back that allows you to change the pocket into a strap to hold the bag onto a carry-on handle. I love the colorful blue on the inside of the bag. This is a well-constructed bag. I highly recommended it. It would be fabulous if it were available in colors and not just brown, then I could justify buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Clontz

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality - Be prepared, it's big
customer_reviews.text: does what I wanted...carries all my stuff including all of my electronics. Lots of pockets. love the padded section for laptop and table. I can fit both in that section. Rich leather. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Deegie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, looks great, stylish, most people think it is my purse. Lots of room, well organised. Other workmates want to order one after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really great. It is beautiful to look at, seems really sturdy and durable (only have had it a couple of weeks) and fits all the things I need to travel for work.
customer_reviews.author: Developer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful and functional bag. Very sturdy and the size is great. Will be using it during my upcoming business and personal travels.
customer_reviews.author: Mija714

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! It fits my laptop perfect n I have a 15.6 dell n I have plenty of space left to put other stuff n it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag for my laptop! Plenty of pockets and looks great. I've had my bag for more than six months and I still get compliments on it almost daily! I'd never bought a Solo product before, but I will shop that brand first from now on. The quality is amazing and it's one of the most comfortable bags to carry!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag but the problem I have is that it is heavy all by itself. When I add a computer and other items it's too heavy to carry. Sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Tutu

customer_reviews.title: Ok.....
customer_reviews.text: Too tall to fit under the seat on an airplane. Good pockets, too bad it doesn't zip shut its ok but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: The tote is attractive and seems durable. It has a generous amount of space and lots of pockets to organize.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Wonderful padded interior for laptop and I use as my work purse even when I don't have my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. it travels well and is just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: V. King

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag exceeded my expectations! It is fashionable, and functionable! Love the color, it is light weight, holds my laptop perfectly. Could not be more pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great Business Tote
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality business tote at a reasonable price and one that was a little unique---this tote meets that criteria. It has plenty of room for a laptop as well as legal size file folders. Love the blue interior. It has good balance and is easy to carry. If I would change anything, it would be to add a stitched design or decorative tooling.
customer_reviews.author: Bluweb

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was purchased as a gift for a colleague. She was recently promoted and I thought needed a professional looking bag in which to carry her laptop to client visits. She loves it! I would recommend it as a gift for any working professional who needs to carry a laptop and other essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Rinker

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: The protective case holds the laptop and the bag has enough space for files. The bag has a pleasing design and the leather is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: i Like the smooth Leather Nice Lining Lots of slots inside to organize your things Hurts my shoulders Too Bulky I am 5'5"tall and it is still too large for me
customer_reviews.author: Pinay Ito

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I use it to carry all the teacher supplies. It's works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: My Sister Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My sister received this bag and she loved it! She said it was great quality and very stylish. I highly recommend it for that hard to buy for person.
customer_reviews.author: BayouBubba

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! What can I say, all my stuff fits, looks great and the slot on the side allows be to hook it on my carry on bag. I have tried SO many bags and this working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag - versatile and stylish - consistently complimented and comfy to carry even with full load
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McCafferty

customer_reviews.title: Awsome tote; great price.
customer_reviews.text: This tote is large enough to carry everything; tablet, purse, and lunch box. Fabric is sturdy and workmanship is good; made to last. It's also makes a great travel companion, with a zipped flap on the back which fits over your luggage handle.
customer_reviews.author: Cad

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I wish I had ordered the smaller size. My 13" MacBook swims in the computer pocket.
customer_reviews.author: NathalieM

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Bucket Laptop Tote
customer_reviews.text: When I received my leather tote bag, I was so excited to open my box up. As soon as I got a hold of my bag, I was in BIG SMILES, cause I know that not one of my friends own my bag. First day I used it my kid said mom, i like ur bag. And then so my friends noticed my bag and asked me where I got it, i told them AMAZON.COM. I LOVE MY Tote bag....SO MUCH ROOM, AND I LOVE THE FACT THAT I STAND OUT IN THE MIDDLE OF THE CROWD. I AM ALSO THINKING OF GETTING ANOTHER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for a good price
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice leather bag. The only thing I did not like was that the bottom of the bag is made from polyester, perhaps for higher durability.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much!!! Great quality and gorgeous. I like vertical laptop bags. They seem to distribute the weight better and I'm not banging into things with my bag either. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PLMSRQ

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to find a computer bag that isn't ugly. This one is roomy, sturdy, and you won't be embarrassed to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Such nice leather! It's so roomy as well. I haven't had it long but it looks well made and I feel very professional using it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much but it is a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much but it is a bit heavy. The top is open so if you get caught out in the rain without an umbrella, your contents can get wet.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: All internal pockets stitching has opened up and I can't return it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself while doing Christmas shopping and just got around to switching it out for my laptop and work items. All of the internal pockets when I put my pends and other items in them have defective stitching and since it's past Jan 31 the website says I can't return it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too long. Drags on the ground if I just ...
customer_reviews.text: Too long. Drags on the ground if I just hold it in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: SlimKatKicks

customer_reviews.title: Please note that this bag is NOT genuine leather. ...
customer_reviews.text: Please note that this bag is NOT genuine leather. This can be bought for a quarter of the price at a local China shop. Based on this information, I would think twice about buying any Solo product, or make extremely sure that what they specify, is what you are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Karin H

product_meta.title: Solo New York Vintage 16" Leather Bucket Tote
product_meta.description:
* This tote is part of the Solo® Vintage Collection.
 * Chic, simple and well-organized, the Vintage 16" Leather Bucket Tote from Solo® is a perfect computer tote for a fashion-minded professional.
 * Padded computer compartment accommodates laptops up to 16".
 * Leather construction with bronze-tone smooth studs.
 * Two slim, rolled shoulder straps.
 * Front exterior zippered pocket.
 * Back exterior Ride Along® pocket for consolidated travel.
 * Open main compartment with snap strap closure.
 * Interior features laptop compartment, organizer section and zippered accessory pocket.
 * Attractive interior lining.
 * Metal feet at bottom for protection.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Bottom Width: 13 in
    *  Middle Width: 13 in
    *  Top Width: 13 in
    *  Depth: 6 in
    *  Height: 16 in
    *  Strap Length: 20 in
    *  Strap Drop: 10 in
    *  Weight: 2 lbs 11 oz
